results.title: The effect of simvastatin on inflammatory cytokines in community-acquired pneumonia: a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial
results.text_hl: Our study suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ does not exert an effect on @DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokine@@@ levels in hospitalised @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Communication_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003147 @@@CAP@@@.

citations.NLM: Viasus D, Garcia-Vidal C, Simonetti AF, Dorca J, Llopis F, Mestre M, Morandeira-Rego F, Carratalà J. The effect of simvastatin on inflammatory cytokines in community-acquired pneumonia: a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial BMJ Open. 2015 Jan 6;5(1):e006251. PMID: 25564143
citations.BibTeX: @article{25564143, title={The effect of simvastatin on inflammatory cytokines in community-acquired pneumonia: a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial}, author={Viasus D and Garcia-Vidal C and Simonetti AF and Dorca J and Llopis F and Mestre M and Morandeira-Rego F and Carratalà J}, journal={BMJ Open}, volume={5}, number={1}, pages={e006251}}

results.title: Simvastatin to modify neutrophil function in older patients with septic pneumonia (SNOOPI): study protocol for a randomised placebo-controlled trial
results.text_hl: This study will investigate the ability of in vivo @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy to modulate neutrophil anti-microbial functions in @<m>DISEASE_Communication_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003147 @@@CAP@@@-associated @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@.

citations.NLM: Greenwood H, Patel J, Mahida R, Wang Q, Parekh D, Dancer RC, Khiroya H, Sapey E, Thickett DR. Simvastatin to modify neutrophil function in older patients with septic pneumonia (SNOOPI): study protocol for a randomised placebo-controlled trial Trials. 2014 Aug 22;15():332. PMID: 25146127
